description: 1KB lightweight, fast & powerful JavaScript templating engine with zero dependencies. Compatible with server-side environments like Node.js, module loaders like RequireJS, Browserify or webpack and all web browsers.

name: blueimp-tmpl

scripts.build: cd js && uglifyjs tmpl.js -c -m -o tmpl.min.js --source-map url=tmpl.min.js.map
scripts.postversion: git push --tags origin master master:gh-pages && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A js

title: JavaScript Templates
